TopicTitle: Anyone Find The Mouse Wheel Is Zooming In Too Fast Now?

Articles.Content: Before it zoomed in at a regular amount but now... one click of the mouse wheel and it jumps in really far.
Still works perfectly fine for me... you can always adjust the sensitivity in the settings!
Reboot your computer, it happens to me and it works for me. Or you can get a new mouse, that works too.

It's not the mouse (well trackball) as it only happens in 21.x. In 20.2 it works fine.

It is especially annoying in map view now... I go to move in closer to my ship and one click and I am through the ship and into the planet.

Edit: I meant space view... I was trying to click on an rcs thruster lol...

Well, here is something confusing. KSP crashes so I restart it... and the mouse wheel is working normally now. Must be an intermittent glitch.

Edited August 1, 2013 by NeoMorph

This has also happened to me, I've found that going into the control panel and changing the number of lines per click of the scroll wheel fixes the problem.

Edit: Bah, I guess four months isn't too much of a necro post...
